casebody.data:
State
v.
Marvin Wade Millsaps 374P13-6 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016

Mr. Barry H. Bloch, Assistant Attorney General, Ms. Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

Mr. Marvin W. Millsaps, For Millsaps, Marvin Wade.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of April 2016 by Defendant for Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of June 2016."
